    public class ProcessService
extends de.esoco.lib.app.Service
    An service implementation that executes a Process.

      • createProcessRunner

        protected ProcessRunner createProcessRunner(de.esoco.lib.app.CommandLine rCommandLine)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates the ProcessRunner instance that will be used to run the process of this application. Can be overridden by subclasses that need to run a sub-class of ProcessRunner.
        Parameters:
        rCommandLine - The application command line
        Returns:
        A process runner instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If creating the runner fails
